briefTitle: Efficacy of Oral Famciclovir 125mg Comparing to Aciclovir 200 mg Treatment in Patients With Active Recurrent Genital Herpes

outcomeMeasures.title: Efficacy Will be Evaluated by the Proportion of Subjects With Non Herpes Manifestation
outcomeMeasures.description: Symptoms evaluated: erythema, papule, vesicle, ulcer, crust, or healed skin.

outcomeMeasures.title: Safety Will be Evaluated by the Adverse Events Occurence
outcomeMeasures.description: Adverse events will be collected and followed in order to evaluate safety and tolerability
